Interactively edit a study configuration by field (field-guided)

Source: R/edit_project.R
edit_project.Rd

Allows the user to interactively browse and edit individual fields within the configuration object, grouped by domain. Field paths are defined within the function to avoid relying on a complete scfg structure.

Usage

edit_project(input = NULL)

Arguments

input

A bg_project_cfg object, a YAML file path, or a project directory containing project_config.yaml. If a directory is provided but the file is absent, edit_project will stop. This argument cannot be NULL.

Value

An updated bg_project_cfg object. The updated configuration is written to project_config.yaml in the project directory unless the user chooses not to overwrite an existing file.
